name: Meditation
description: Ales received a higher professional art education. Bachelor’s degree in fine arts. Ales Lyalush works in digital painting techniques on an iPad Pro . Tablet, as a means, allows him a wider and more versatile use of the skills learned in the study of classical techniques of painting and drawing. Original, ironic view of the author’s world, is reflected in his amazingly subtle and philosophical works. Participated in numerous exhibitions in Russia and abroad.
